reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of CHEM 113, CHEM 123, SCIE 001.
This waitlist is for ALL lecture sections. You will be moved into active registration IF space becomes available. Timetables MAY BE MODIFIED to allow conflict-free registration. Waitlisting does not guarantee placement in this course. If you are waitlisted, it is recommended that you access the SSC periodically to check your status. It is YOUR responsibility to check the SSC for registration changes.
courseName: Organic Chemistry for the Biological Sciences
description: Reactions and properties of carbonyl compounds, carbohydrates, amino acids, nucleic acids.
